content: I didn't find the book in the library, so I decided to buy it. Unfortunately it was too expensive. However I found it on the Internet.
translations: ita:Non ho trovato il libro nella biblioteca, per cui ho deciso di comprarlo. Sfortunatamente era molto costoso. Tuttavia, l
